# AI Tool Box (10EX.AI)

> A curated directory of 600 AI tools for writing, design, coding, marketing, and moreâ€”with comparisons, programmatic SEO guides, and free micro-agents.

AI Tool Box is the definitive programmatic directory for discovering and comparing AI tools in 2026. The site is organized into category hubs, individual tool pages, SEO-optimized blog guides, and interactive agents. Use the sections below to find the most relevant pages for your query.

## Core pages

- [Home](https://tools.10ex.ai/)
- [AI Agents](https://tools.10ex.ai/ai-agents) : Email and lead-magnet micro-agents
- [Agents (legacy)](https://tools.10ex.ai/agents)
- [Trending tools](https://tools.10ex.ai/trending)
- [Free AI tools](https://tools.10ex.ai/free-ai-tools)
- [New AI tools](https://tools.10ex.ai/new-ai-tools)
- [Stack builder](https://tools.10ex.ai/stack)
- [Prompt library](https://tools.10ex.ai/prompts)
- [AI news](https://tools.10ex.ai/news)
- [Blog & guides](https://tools.10ex.ai/blog)

- [AI automation tools](https://tools.10ex.ai/blog/ai-automation-tools)
